name: @saekitominaga/report-same-referrer
description: Send script error information to endpoints.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ReportSameReferrer.js -- brotlin compress dist/ReportSameReferrer.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ReportSameReferrer.js -- terser dist/ReportSameReferrer.js -o dist/ReportSameReferrer.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/ReportSameReferrer.js.map',filename='ReportSameReferrer.js',includeSources,url='ReportSameReferrer.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ReportSameReferrer.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/ReportSameReferrer.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ReportSameReferrer.d.ts -- cpy dist/ReportSameReferrer.d.ts dist --rename=ReportSameReferrer.min.d.ts
